tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE speech_models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    training_data BYTEA,
    testing_data BYTEA,
    accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE audio_files (
    file_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    spectrogram BYTEA,
    uploaded_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE training_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    file_id UUID REFERENCES audio_files(file_id),
    label VARCHAR(100),
    duration FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE test_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    file_id UUID REFERENCES audio_files(file_id),
    evaluation_result VARCHAR(50),
    confidence_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SpectrogramTraining (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audio_file_path VARCHAR(255),
  spectrogram_data BLOB
)

CREATE TABLE SpectrogramTesting (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audio_file_path VARCHAR(255),
  spectrogram_data BLOB
)

CREATE TABLE SpeechRecognitionModels (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(50),
  architecture_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ModelTrainingLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT,
  training_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  training_loss FLOAT
)
